EmailTemplate.name: New Trialforce Welcome/What to Expect
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to Litify — What's Next?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName},
Welcome to Litify — we're glad to have you.
Thank you for signing up to see how Litify can transform your practice into a more successful business.
Follow this guide to finish the remaining steps to set up your Litify trial: https://success.litify.com/s/article/New-Litify-Trialforce-Org-Setup-Guide
If you need help, please contact Litify Customer Support at support@litify.com or submit a request online at https://www.litify.com/success/
— The Litify Team
